title: Ep. 403 - Trump Calls The Left’s Bluff At The Border
description:
President Trump has announced plans to end family separation at the border, and the Left is angrier than ever. Then, San Francisco politicians rebrand criminals as “justice-involved persons.” Finally, another 2020 Democratic presidential candidate drops out! Date: 08-23-2019
